settings.zoomlevel.name: Zoom level
settings.zoomlevel.tooltip: The value of the desired zoom level.
settings.zoomlevelkey.name: Zoom level hold key
settings.zoomlevelkey.tooltip: Keybinds that need to be held to change the zoom level using the mouse wheel.
settings.zoomlevelresetkey.name: Zoom level reset key
settings.zoomlevelresetkey.tooltip: Keybinds that need to be held to reset the zoom level to the desired value.
settings.uiscale.name: UI scale
settings.uiscale.tooltip: The value of the desired UI scale.
settings.uiscalekey.name: UI scale hold key
settings.uiscalekey.tooltip: Keybinds that need to be held to change the UI scale using the mouse wheel.
settings.uiscaleresetkey.name: UI scale reset key
settings.uiscaleresetkey.tooltip: Keybinds that need to be held to reset the UI scale to the desired value.
